name: Cohiba (Non Cuban) - Comador - Toro Grande
additionalNotes: The Cohiba crew has teamed up with Shawn Carter, AKA the rap sensation JAY Z, to create a cigar of pure luxury. The dynamic duo took over two years to craft the beauty before you today, and the results were well worth the wait. A truly rare blend, Comador plays host to a bevy of uber-refined tobaccos. Hand-selected long-fillers from the most fertile regions of Central America and the Caribean Basin intertwine, held snuggly in place by a vintage Connecticut Broadleaf binder. A gorgeous 4-year aged, Connecticut wrapper graces the top of Comador, carefully chosen from Cohiba’s proprietary farms in the pristine Connecticut River Valley.
